item.title: Kara add a quote by Marcel Proust
item.description: "The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes, but in having new eyes." -- Marcel Proust

item.title: Kara add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Every woman is a rebel." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kara add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "If you do follow your bliss you put yourself on a kind of track that has been there all the while, waiting for you, and the life that you ought to be living is the one you are living. Follow your bliss and don't be afraid, and doors will open where you didn't know they were going to be." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Kara add a quote by Frederick Buechner
item.description: "You can kiss your family and friends good-bye and put miles between you, but at the same time you carry them with you in your heart, your mind, your stomach, because you do not just live in a world but a world lives in you." -- Frederick Buechner
